title: Thanksgiving
description: The table is set. The festivities have begun. But an uninvited guest has arrived.
quote: This year there will be no leftovers.
altHero: a Thanksgiving turkey with a knife stuck in it
alt1: a man dressed as a turkey dressed as a Pilgrim
alt2: two men crouch near a body with severed head
alt3: a man wearing a black boot pulls an axe from a stump
alt4: an older woman in an apron screams in fear
